issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.59 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #60b442, font size: 18.0pt (24px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 3:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.59:1. Recommendation:  change background to #53a735.
